00007 +(id)withTarget:(id)target {
00008         return [[[self alloc] initWithTarget:target] autorelease];
00009 }
00010 
00011 -(id)initWithTarget:(id)_target {
00012         if (self = [super init]) {
00013                 self.target = _target;
00014         }
00015         return self;
00016 }
00017 
00018 - (NSMethodSignature *)methodSignatureForSelector:(SEL)aSelector {
00019         if ([target respondsToSelector:aSelector]) {
00020                 return [target methodSignatureForSelector:aSelector];
00021         }
00022         return [super methodSignatureForSelector:aSelector];
00023 }
00024 
00025 - (void)forwardInvocation:(NSInvocation *)anInvocation {
00026         [anInvocation invokeWithTarget:target];
00027 }
00028 
00029 - (BOOL)respondsToSelector:(SEL)aSelector {
00030         return [target respondsToSelector:aSelector];
00031 }
00032 
00033 -(NSString *)description {
00034         return [NSString stringWithFormat:@"Proxy: %@", [target description]];
00035 }
00036 
00037 -(void)dealloc {
00038         self.target = nil;
00039         [super dealloc];
00040 }
